data.title: Averill Park students recommend Golden Knights for new mascot
data.meta_description: Students at Averill Park Central School District have recommended Golden Knights as the district’s new mascot. Districts throughout the state have been phasing out Native-themed mascots. A student-led committee has been working to select a new nickname. Golden Knights received 54% of the vote among the two finalists compared with 46% for Lakers.
data.text:
Students at Averill Park Central School District have recommended Golden Knights as the district’s new mascot.

Districts throughout the state have been phasing out Native-themed mascots. A student-led committee has been working to select a new nickname. Golden Knights received 54% of the vote among the two finalists compared with 46% for Lakers.

The Board of Education will meet on June 17 to accept the recommendation. The new nickname would go into effect for the 2025-2026 school year. The district will spend the next school year working to develop a new logo and mascot.
